author: jnosek1
title: Get Into Fighting Shape With This Combat Challenge

organizations.name: men's health your privacy rights canadian customers

text:
Get Into Fighting Shape With This Combat Challenge Improve your athleticism, burn fat, and increase strength with this total-body workout By Naomi Nazario February 7, 2017 Men's Health Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
This combat challenge from Miami-based trainer Idalis Velasquez is a total-body workout with an emphasis on your posterior chain (backside), which is often neglected in typical training routines. There’s a little bit of everything: strength, endurance, cardio, and plyometrics. All that activity with no rest between exercises means you’ll be knocking out body fat. 
The box jump will improve your athleticism, while chinups will test your upper body strength, endurance, and grip. The landmine single-leg straight-leg deadlift will work your core, hamstrings, and glutes while taking stress off your lower back in comparison to a conventional deadlift. Advertisement
